overview: Geoff Merrick is responsible for GlobalOne capabilities including CRM, Cloud Strategy, and Social Business Services. He was a founder and Chief Architect of OKERE, an IT consultancy acquired by Fujitsu, which was one of the first to focus exclusively on SaaS and cloud computing. Prior to OKERE, Geoff was a Regional Architect at Siebel Systems focused on enterprise clients. Most recently, Geoff was responsible for professional services and product management at Ripple6, a social technology company acquired by Gannett Digital in 2008.
